title:
I\'m sure this is problematic around all schools, but since Codington Elementary is the one I have personal experience with, I\'ll ask about it:



What percentage of children are dropped off by private car in the mornings at school?  Or vice versa..what percent of children ride the school bus to the facility in the mornings?
text:
About 22 percent of Codington's 535 students ride the bus in the
morning, according to Assistant Principal Lauren Kefalonitis. That
number increases for the afternoon ride, Kefalonitis said.

In the district overall, about 48 percent of all students ride the
bus, according to NHCS spokeswoman Jeri Atchue.
